data: --- title: Layout description: The building blocks for creating responsive layouts. tags: - responsive - layout - regions - content - navigation - breakpoints childPageOrder: - top-bar - side-bar - page - grid - breakpoints --- import Resources from "./_components/Resources.astro"; Layout is divided into three distinct regions: - Top Bar - Side Bar - Page ## Navigation components The layout also provides the necessary regions for two navigation components: - Tree Navigation (Placed within the Side Bar) - Breadcrumb (Placed within the Page) ## Resources
